item.title: Story Stains: An Idea forms
item.description: For the last month or so I’ve been working on Story Stains, an app to help analyze stories and find out how they tick. The past year or so I’ve been attempting to write my own stories and in this journey I’ve learnt the necessity to understand how they work. First, from a course on writing I took from Faber, and secondly from multiple ‘how to write books’. I’ve written freeform reviews, structured reviews with template headings of ‘Characters’, ‘Setting’, ‘Theme’, ‘Mood’, ‘Pace’, and attempted to make a questionnaire: ‘What are the main themes?
